title: The Bible - Are You Rapture Ready?
description:
Numbers 10:9 `And when ye go into battle in your land against the adversary who is distressing you, then ye have shouted with the trumpets, and ye have been remembered before Jehovah your God, and ye have been saved from your enemies. `And in the day of your gladness, and in your appointed seasons, and in the beginnings of your months, ye have blown also with the trumpets over your burnt-offerings, and over the sacrifices of your peace-offerings, and they have been to you for a memorial before your God; I, Jehovah, am your God.' God loves a party!! Why in the world would Christians only want doom and gloom? God has appointed times for us to rejoice in Him.

Zephaniah 3:14-17 Sing, O daughter of Zion; shout, O Israel; be glad and rejoice with all the heart, O daughter of Jerusalem. The LORD hath taken away thy judgments, he hath cast out thine enemy: the king of Israel, even the LORD, is in the midst of thee: thou shalt not see evil any more. In that day it shall be said to Jerusalem, Fear thou not: and to Zion, Let not thine hands be slack. The LORD thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Are You Certain You will Go At The Rapture?
How Rapture Ready Are You? This thought-provoking sermon by Charles Lawson helps one contemplate their Christian journey and if you are truly ready or if you will taken off-guard by the "thief in the night"? Don't be blind-sided by the events yet to come by properly preparing yourself for these prophetic events.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pretrib Rapture Doubters Be Warned:
Perry Stone presents many biblical verses revealing the prophesied upcoming Rapture. "The Rapture is not a blessing for salvation but a blessing for faithfulness." Time to listen to this wake-up call.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rapture Ready - Prepare for the 1st onto the Last:
Are you a Rapture believer? Even if not, it's our Christian duty to prepare ourselves from the first trump onto the last putting on the full armor of God so that He can secure our journey alomg His path of Righteousness set before us. It's time to put on your thinking cap folks and walk like a Christian should walk... BE LIKE JESUS. We need to ask ourselves often... "What would Jesus Do?"
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rapture Versus No Rapture:
This sermon compares the different versus used in support of the Rapture and anti-rapture doctrines to determine which is correct.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Feast of Trumpets symbolizes the RAPTURE:
Mark Biltz presents the biblical interpretation of the Jewish Feast of Trumpets and how it relates to God's messages contained in the Holy scripture. Marvelous are His ways and Pastor Blitz explains God's plan of salvation extremely well. It truly is amazing to understand how God planned the Rapture of the church and how He created the Jewish Feasts to mirror such events. All are encouraged to view the presentation and experience the joy of understanding God's plan of salvation.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feast of Trumpets - Rosh Hashanah:
Mark Biltz is probably one of the Greatest Teachers of the Lord and the hidden messages found through out the Bible and understanding of The Feast of our Lord. May this series bless each and everyone of you and draw you closer to the Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. Get personal with the Lord, time is VERY short.

Pastor Biltz helps us discover how the Feasts of the Lord given to the Hebrews are not feasts of old, no longer relevant to the modern church, but of utmost importance to modern Christians of today. The prophetic adventure begins now. Learn how the Lord will fulfill each of the Fall Feasts to the very day of His second coming, beginning iwth the Feast of Trumpets! Yeshua is the same yesterday, today and forever. Just as the SpringFeasts were fulfilled in order to the very day, so will the Falls Feasts be fulfilled in order and to the very day
